connector.description: Send messages to a Slack channel.

camel.kamelet.slack-sink.channel.name: camel.kamelet.slack-sink.channel
camel.kamelet.slack-sink.channel.description: The Slack channel to send messages to. Example: #myroom

camel.kamelet.slack-sink.webhookUrl.name: camel.kamelet.slack-sink.webhookUrl
camel.kamelet.slack-sink.webhookUrl.description: The webhook URL used by the Slack channel to handle incoming messages.

camel.kamelet.slack-sink.iconEmoji.name: camel.kamelet.slack-sink.iconEmoji
camel.kamelet.slack-sink.iconEmoji.description: Use a Slack emoji as an avatar.

camel.kamelet.slack-sink.iconUrl.name: camel.kamelet.slack-sink.iconUrl
camel.kamelet.slack-sink.iconUrl.description: The avatar that the component will use when sending message to a channel or user.

camel.kamelet.slack-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.slack-sink.username
camel.kamelet.slack-sink.username.description: This is the username that the bot will have when sending messages to a channel or user.
